data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Liu, Wan-Gang, Fabrizi, Silvia, Bai, Ming, Yang, Xing-Ke, Ahrens, Dirk (2014): A taxonomic revision of the Neoserica (sensu lato) pilosula group (Coleoptera, Scarabaeidae, Sericini). ZooKeys 440: 89-113, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.440.8126, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.440.8126
